Plot: This tragicomedy is a self-ironic portrait of a young man who drops out of university and ends up wandering the streets of the city he lives: Berlin. The film deals with the desire to ...
Title: A Coffee in Berlin
Actors: Tom Schilling, Katharina Schüttler, Justus von Dohnányi, Andreas Schröders
tomatoConsensus: Amiably slight, A Coffee in Berlin compensates for its lack of narrative drive with a sure-handed screenplay and echoes of early Woody Allen.
